title: Patcher window wrong size after 4.20
body:
Hi everyone,

There is currently a known issue affecting how the patcher window displays its content that can prevent you from changing region, accepting the EULA or launching the client. While we work to resolve the issue, you can work around it by resetting your DPI settings back to 100% by following the steps below:

1) Open your Control Panel
2) Select Appearance and Personalization
3) Select Display
4) Choose the 100% (default) option
5) Click on Apply
6) Re-launch League of Legends

replies.body: where exactly is the control panel?
For Mac Users, this also happens to the login screen.
